verses.verse: Peter, <S%G4074><s%> an apostle <S%G652><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> to the strangers <S%G3927><s%> scattered throughout <S%G1290><s%> Pontus, <S%G4195><s%> Galatia, <S%G1053><s%> Cappadocia, <S%G2587><s%> Asia, <S%G773><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Bithynia, <S%G978><s%>

Elect <S%G1588><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to the foreknowledge <S%G4268><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> the Father, <S%G3962><s%> through <S%G1722><s%> sanctification <S%G38><s%> of the Spirit, <S%G4151><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> obedience <S%G5218><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> sprinkling <S%G4473><s%> of the blood <S%G129><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ: <S%G5547><s%> Grace <S%G5485><s%> unto you, <S%G5213><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> peace, <S%G1515><s%> be multiplied. <S%G4129><s%>

Blessed <S%G2128><s%> be the <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> of our <S%G2257><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> which according <S%G2596><s%> to his <S%G848><s%> abundant <S%G4183><s%> mercy <S%G1656><s%> hath begotten us again <S%G313><s%> <S%G2248><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> a lively <S%G2198><s%> hope <S%G1680><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> the resurrection <S%G386><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> the dead, <S%G3498><s%>

To <S%G1519><s%> an inheritance <S%G2817><s%> incorruptible, <S%G862><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> undefiled, <S%G283><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> that fadeth not away, <S%G263><s%> reserved <S%G5083><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> you, <S%G2248><s%>

Who are kept <S%G5432><s%> by <S%G1722><s%> the power <S%G1411><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> salvation <S%G4991><s%> ready <S%G2092><s%> to be revealed <S%G601><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the last <S%G2078><s%> time. <S%G2540><s%>

Wherein <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3739><s%> ye greatly rejoice, <S%G21><s%> though now <S%G737><s%> for a season, <S%G3641><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> need be, <S%G1163><s%> <S%G2076><s%> ye are in heaviness <S%G3076><s%> through <S%G1722><s%> manifold <S%G4164><s%> temptations: <S%G3986><s%>

That <S%G2443><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> trial <S%G1383><s%> of your <S%G5216><s%> faith, <S%G4102><s%> being much <S%G4183><s%> more precious <S%G5093><s%> than of gold <S%G5553><s%> that perisheth, <S%G622><s%> though <S%G1161><s%> it be tried <S%G1381><s%> with <S%G1223><s%> fire, <S%G4442><s%> might be found <S%G2147><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> praise <S%G1868><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> honor <S%G5092><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> glory <S%G1391><s%> at <S%G1722><s%> the appearing <S%G602><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ: <S%G5547><s%>

Whom <S%G3739><s%> having not <S%G3756><s%> seen, <S%G1492><s%> ye love; <S%G25><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> whom, <S%G3739><s%> though now <S%G737><s%> ye see <S%G3708><s%> him not, <S%G3361><s%> yet <S%G1161><s%> believing, <S%G4100><s%> ye rejoice <S%G21><s%> with joy <S%G5479><s%> unspeakable <S%G412><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> full of glory: <S%G1392><s%>
Receiving <S%G2865><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> end <S%G5056><s%> of your <S%G5216><s%> faith, <S%G4102><s%> even the salvation <S%G4991><s%> of your souls. <S%G5590><s%>

Of <S%G4012><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> salvation <S%G4991><s%> the prophets <S%G4396><s%> have inquired <S%G1567><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> searched diligently, <S%G1830><s%> who prophesied <S%G4395><s%> of <S%G4012><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> grace <S%G5485><s%> that should come unto <S%G1519><s%> you: <S%G5209><s%>

Searching <S%G2045><s%> what, <S%G5101><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> what manner <S%G4169><s%> of time <S%G2540><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> of Christ <S%G5547><s%> which was in <S%G1722><s%> them <S%G846><s%> did signify, <S%G1213><s%> when it testified beforehand <S%G4303><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> sufferings <S%G3804><s%> of <S%G1519><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> glory <S%G1391><s%> that should follow. <S%G3326><s%> <S%G5023><s%>

Unto whom <S%G3739><s%> it was revealed, <S%G601><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> unto themselves, <S%G1438><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> unto us <S%G2254><s%> they did minister <S%G1247><s%> the things, <S%G846><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> are now <S%G3568><s%> reported <S%G312><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> them that have preached the gospel <S%G2097><s%> unto you <S%G5209><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> the Holy <S%G40><s%> Ghost <S%G4151><s%> sent down <S%G649><s%> from <S%G575><s%> heaven; <S%G3772><s%> which things <S%G3739><s%> the angels <S%G32><s%> desire <S%G1937><s%> to look <S%G3879><s%> into. <S%G1519><s%>

Wherefore <S%G1352><s%> gird up <S%G328><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> loins <S%G3751><s%> of your <S%G5216><s%> mind, <S%G1271><s%> be sober, <S%G3525><s%> and hope <S%G1679><s%> to the end <S%G5049><s%> for <S%G1909><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> grace <S%G5485><s%> that is to be brought <S%G5342><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%> at <S%G1722><s%> the revelation <S%G602><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ; <S%G5547><s%>

As <S%G5613><s%> obedient <S%G5218><s%> children, <S%G5043><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> fashioning yourselves <S%G4964><s%> according to the <S%G3588><s%> former <S%G4386><s%> lusts <S%G1939><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> ignorance: <S%G52><s%>

But <S%G235><s%> as <S%G2596><s%> he which hath called <S%G2564><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> is holy, <S%G40><s%> so <S%G2532><s%> be <S%G1096><s%> ye <S%G846><s%> holy <S%G40><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> all manner <S%G3956><s%> of conversation; <S%G391><s%>
Because <S%G1360><s%> it is written, <S%G1125><s%> Be <S%G1096><s%> ye holy; <S%G40><s%> for <S%G3754><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> am <S%G1510><s%> holy. <S%G40><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> ye call on <S%G1941><s%> the Father, <S%G3962><s%> who without respect of persons judgeth <S%G2919><s%> <S%G678><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to every man's <S%G1538><s%> work, <S%G2041><s%> pass <S%G390><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> time <S%G5550><s%> of your <S%G5216><s%> sojourning <S%G3940><s%> here in <S%G1722><s%> fear: <S%G5401><s%>

Forasmuch as ye know <S%G1492><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> ye were not <S%G3756><s%> redeemed <S%G3084><s%> with corruptible things, <S%G5349><s%> as silver <S%G694><s%> and <S%G2228><s%> gold, <S%G5553><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> vain <S%G3152><s%> conversation <S%G391><s%> received by tradition from your fathers; <S%G3970><s%>

But <S%G235><s%> with the precious <S%G5093><s%> blood <S%G129><s%> of Christ, <S%G5547><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> of a lamb <S%G286><s%> without blemish <S%G299><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> without spot: <S%G784><s%>

Who verily <S%G3303><s%> was foreordained <S%G4267><s%> before <S%G4253><s%> the foundation <S%G2602><s%> of the world, <S%G2889><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> was manifest <S%G5319><s%> in <S%G1909><s%> these last <S%G2078><s%> times <S%G5550><s%> for <S%G1223><s%> you, <S%G5209><s%>

Who by <S%G1223><s%> him <S%G846><s%> do believe <S%G4100><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> that raised him up <S%G1453><s%> <S%G846><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> the dead, <S%G3498><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> gave <S%G1325><s%> him <S%G846><s%> glory; <S%G1391><s%> that <S%G5620><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> hope <S%G1680><s%> might be <S%G1511><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> God. <S%G2316><s%>

Seeing ye have purified <S%G48><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> souls <S%G5590><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> obeying <S%G5218><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> truth <S%G225><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> unfeigned <S%G505><s%> love of the brethren, <S%G5360><s%> see that ye love <S%G25><s%> one another <S%G240><s%> with <S%G1537><s%> a pure <S%G2513><s%> heart <S%G2588><s%> fervently: <S%G1619><s%>

Being born again, <S%G313><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> corruptible <S%G5349><s%> seed, <S%G4701><s%> but <S%G235><s%> of incorruptible, <S%G862><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> which liveth <S%G2198><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> abideth <S%G3306><s%> forever. <S%G1519><s%> <S%G165><s%>

For <S%G1360><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> flesh <S%G4561><s%> is as <S%G5613><s%> grass, <S%G5528><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the glory <S%G1391><s%> of man <S%G444><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> the flower <S%G438><s%> of grass. <S%G5528><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> grass <S%G5528><s%> withereth, <S%G3583><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> flower <S%G438><s%> thereof <S%G846><s%> falleth away: <S%G1601><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> word <S%G4487><s%> of the Lord <S%G2962><s%> endureth <S%G3306><s%> forever. <S%G1519><s%> <S%G165><s%> And <S%G1161><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> word <S%G4487><s%> which by the gospel is preached <S%G2097><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> you. <S%G5209><s%>
